Hi Marcos,

As of the Prism February 2009 release, the DirectoryModuleCatalog works appropriately. For more information, you could check the modularity QuickStarts:

Thank you for your feedback.

WorkItem.Description:
I changed the references in my project to drop 9, and the shell was empty.
 
I verified: the ModuleCatalog returns 0 items.
 
Just come back to Drop 8 dll and everything is ok.
 
Marcos
